brief.image_brief: A split image or visual transition. On one side, a digital ad dashboard with red, downward-trending graphs and digital coins/bills visibly 'leaking' or falling off the screen, symbolizing wasted budget and slow processes. On the other side, the same dashboard is optimized, displaying vibrant green, upward-trending performance metrics, fast-forward icons, and a streamlined, efficient interface. The overall aesthetic should be clean, modern, and professional, conveying rapid, instant optimization and financial efficiency. Focus on digital screens and data visualization, appealing to a Head of Performance Marketing.

scenes.visual: Close-up on a digital screen displaying a performance ad dashboard. A prominent red graph is visibly declining, and subtle animation shows digital coins/bills 'dripping' or falling away from the screen's edge. Sound: subtle dripping.

A professional (Olivia-like persona) at a modern desk, looking slightly frustrated. They are surrounded by multiple open browser tabs or complex spreadsheets, appearing to manually adjust ad settings. A clock on the wall ticks rapidly, emphasizing time pressure.

A swift, almost magical visual transition. The cluttered screens and manual work dissolve into a single, sleek, modern platform interface. Data points on the screen rapidly animate, transforming from red to vibrant green, showing strong upward trends. A 'speedometer' or 'iteration cycle' graphic spins rapidly and lands on 'Optimized' or 'Instant'.

The professional now smiles confidently, observing the optimized dashboard with ease. A progress bar quickly fills, indicating 'Campaign Optimized' or 'Iteration Complete.' Text overlay: 'Instantly Optimize Performance Ads.'
Final shot of the clean, efficient dashboard, with the company logo subtly integrated. The CTA text appears clearly and prominently on screen.

video_brief.voiceover: Is your ad budget draining away? Stop slow testing and inefficient allocation. Instantly streamline ad campaigns for unprecedented results.
